text: Cercosaura nigroventris is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Venezuela. ==References== Category:Cercosaura Category:Reptiles of Venezuela Category:Endemic fauna of Venezuela Category:Reptiles described in 1999 Category:Taxa named by Stefan Jan Filip Gorzula Category:Taxa named by Josefa Celsa Señaris
title: Cercosaura nigroventris
